name: Capture One Lens Cast Correction File
summary: Learn about .LCC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: LCC files can be calibrated for a specific camera lens and then reused to adjust collections of images.

description: File used by Capture One, a photo editing application used with Phase One digital cameras; used for correcting and enhancing images for higher image quality; includes settings such as exposure, contrast, brightness, saturation, color cast, light falloff, and chromatic aberration.
